mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Samuels, Henry J. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Samuels, Henry J.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov FH Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Dec 17 1862. By Telegraph from Washington 17 1862. Will see Mr. P tomorrow morning have tried in vain refused Willey & Brown send first mail to me at Maltby House Balti. Your proclamation ordering election in Norfolk districts & writs of election Leave all dates blank proclamation necessary Leave all dates blank [page 2]certain Samuels 44w103&243coll
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Samuels, Henry J.
Washington, D.C.
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
